Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0475 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-22
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-0475 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-22. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package terraform is earlier than 1.3.2-22, affected by CVE-2023-0475
